---
title: "GraphBoot"
output: html_notebook
---

Finds avg coverage of dataset for 10 seeds. 

```{r}
require(plyr)
require(ggplot2)


rm(list=ls(all=TRUE))

vis<-function(inputFolder,dataset){
  
  dataFrame <-(read.csv(paste(inputFolder,"exp",dataset,".txt",sep=""),sep="\t",header=T))
  effect <- ddply(dataFrame,.(seed),summarise,V1=mean(lmsiDistinct),V2=mean(lmsiAll))
  effect<-cbind(effect,dataset) 
  return(effect)
   
}
resultFolder <- "C:/Users/cxa123230/IdeaProjects/GraphBoot/results/"
data<-data.frame()
data<- vis(resultFolder,"Facebook")
data<-rbind(data,vis(resultFolder,"Enron"))
 data<-rbind(data,vis(resultFolder,"Dblp"))
 data<-rbind(data,vis(resultFolder,"Epinions"))
 data<-rbind(data,vis(resultFolder,"Wiki"))

m12<- ggplot(data,aes(x=seed,y=V1,color=dataset,group=dataset))+scale_x_continuous(name="seed")+theme(legend.position = c(0.8, 0.8),text = element_text(size=16))+scale_y_sqrt(name="fraction of nodes")
m12<-m12+geom_line(size=1)+geom_point(aes(shape=dataset), size=2) +scale_shape_manual(values=c(0,1,2,3,4))
m12
ggsave(filename=paste(resultFolder,"figs/coverage.eps",sep=""),plot=m12,width=6,height=4,unit="in")
data[data$seed==10,] 

```
